meanings.definition: Thrown with the hand above the shoulder.
meanings.sent1: The overhanded throw reached the target accurately.
meanings.sent2: She always used an overhanded technique when throwing a ball.
meanings.sent3: The overhanded toss made the game more exciting.
meanings.sent4: His overhanded style of throwing was like a skilled archer aiming for a bullseye.
meanings.sent5: The coach demonstrated the overhanded technique with precision.

meanings.sent2: He completed the task using an overhanded approach.
meanings.sent3: The overhanded action surprised everyone with its effectiveness.
meanings.sent4: The overhanded motion was as graceful as a dancer's twirl.
meanings.sent5: The overhanded method proved to be the most efficient.
